description.value:
Frequency once per day

While athamarus' natural pheromones are typically used for communication, you have developed yours into a defense mechanism to ward off foes. You emit a thick spray of defensive pheromones at an adjacent creature, who takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level +1)/2)+1)d6[poison]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC.

At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6.
